name: Ivan Louis's Basics in Mathematic and Scientific
name_original: Ivan Louis's Basics in Mathematic and Scientific
description:
NOTICE: The game Ivan Louis Animate's Basics is also being in progress by Yuli Blues. I've decided to create another game called Ivan Louis's Basics, So yeah!

Credit goes to:

MystMan12 for the Original

Logo Boy Enterprises for the characters that he made, You're the best Logo Boy!

The mod is In Progress for the 3D, Download will be available soon!

This includes the following:

Version 1

Version 2

Version 3

Including a Field Trip, Wonderful!

Are you a YouTuber? I would be very happy if you want to record this mod!

Play the 2D Version on Scratch:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/702367985/

Beta in Progress, The update is coming soon for the full version.

Wanna Play the Original one on Android and iOS? Here are those if you want to try them out!

Cast:

Me - Ivan Louis

Principal of the Thing - Nayovi

Playtime - Paula

Arts & Crafters - Pablo

Man with the Broom - Gotta Sweep

It's a Bully - Dr. Bunny

1st Prize - Logo Boy
